tossup_question: -  19)  – 	What is the optical depth of the solid Earth at visible wavelengths?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Zero
X) Much greater than one
Y) Much less than one
Z) One
tossup_answer: ANSWER: X) MUCH GREATER THAN ONE
